wiki.summary: According to the Opposite of Adults Songfacts,the message of the song is "everybody wants to be a kid forever. No one wants to grow up." Chiddy Bang are a Philadelphia based duo composed of nineteen year old Nigerian born Chidera Anamege (Chiddy) and nineteen year old production whizz-kid Noah Beresin, A.K.A Xaphoon Jones. 'Opposite Of Adults', their cleverly titled debut UK single, which is a re-working of MGMT's 'Kids' – gave the guys a March 2010 hit.
